text.div:
Organization, Agency, Department

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
AE American Expressadded v2.5
DEA Drug Enforcement AgencyThe US Drug Enforcement Administration does not solely assign DEA numbers in the United States. Hospitals have the authority to issue DEA numbers to their medical residents. These DEA numbers are based upon the hospitalâ€™s DEA number, but the authority rests with the hospital on the assignment to the residents. Thus, DEA as an Assigning Authority is necessary in addition to DEA as an Identifier Type.added v2.5
DOD Department of DefenseIn some countries e.g., the US, more than one department may issue a military identifier. Hence, US is not sufficient as the Assigning Authority.added v2.5
MC Master Cardadded v2.5
VA Veterans Affairsadded v2.5
VI Visaadded v2.5
